forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Leg Tuning & Fixes!

comments.text: Hi! v165 (you're on [version]) brings an update for the L.E.G. spot (L.E.G. is short for  Literally Everything Goes) & more! Enjoy & thx all!
Name tags can now show longer names in multiple lines!
There's the new Me option "Show body part counts"! It adds the count on name tags, letting you better know where lag come from (as high counts can lag).
We improved the Me mirror! It now has no more reflective glare that obstructed visibility; shows better & brighter colors; is 10cm more down to better show legs ...
... and is a bit thinner to better show the surrounding when opening it frequently (like when checking your leg movement)!
Scrolling a webpage on Oculus led to the legs being moved, that's fixed now! Thx Ferny!
Grabbing the inventory or making it buzz while leg-puppeteering is fixed now! Thx Zid!
The "When trigger let go" command is now also available for legs (including the accompanying body tell)! Thx Zid & Gold!
The issue of Holdables still moving and catching triggers while you are leg puppeteering is fixed! Thx Zid & Gold
Your adjusted legs position will now be remembered across sessions!
leg (and l.e.g.) positions are now saved into bodies for the head-auto-equips approach (including putting them on via the one-tap inventory feature)!
~~ Interlude ~~ As my web ads income which keeps my dev life alive continues to shrink, you can help out with pledging a monthly amount, from small to big, at Patreon.com/anyland!
